data.name: Vreal
data.detailed_description:
Vreal is an app that captures VR gameplay and allows viewers to watch within the game itself. Viewers can watch in VR from their headset (HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, Windows Mixed Reality) and can teleport, move around, and pause the recording to experience the VR game the way the player experienced it.

No headset? No problem! Viewers can also watch VR content in Desktop Mode for an immersive spectator experience that gives them full control of where they want to watch in the VR game environment. Want to get started watching content? Download the app, select “Play”, and then select “Launch in Desktop (non-VR) Mode”.

If you want to try making your own VR recording, you will need a VR headset and you will need to own one of the supported titles:
  • Blocks
  • Fantastic Contraption
  • GORN
  • Gunheart
  • Hot Dogs, Horseshoes, and Hand Grenades
  • SUPERHOT VR
  • Tilt Brush
  • + More games coming soon

Do you love VR? Want to chat about VR content? Have a game we MUST add to Vreal? Join our Discord to chat with us; we’d love to know what you think!

data.short_description: Create VR content with a variety of VR games and upload your content for friends to replay on demand either from their own VR headsets or on their desktops with an immersive spectator experience. Vreal is in Early Access; try us out for free!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
